om.graph
Class World

java.lang.Object
  om.graph.World

public class World
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a co-ordinate system for use in a graph.

Constructor Detail

World

public World(World.Context cs,
             org.w3c.dom.Element e)
      throws GraphFormatException
Constructs from XML.

XML syntax for worlds is:
<world id="w1" px="20" py="10" pw="260" ph="280" xleft="0.0" ybottom="-1.0" xright="10.0" ytop="1.0"/>

May contain all other graph items, which will be constructed and added.

Parameters:
cs - Source for colour constants
e - <world> element
Throws:
GraphFormatException - If anything's wrong with the XML

convertColour

public java.awt.Color convertColour(java.lang.String sValue)
                             throws GraphFormatException
Converts a colour string using the world's colour source.

You should use this method to obtain Color objects representing the graph colour constants 'fg', 'graph1', etc.

Parameters:
sValue - #rgb, #rrggbb, or colour constant
Returns:
Java Color object
Throws:
GraphFormatException - If a constant isn't found or value format wrong
